{% verbatim %}

Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageRequest

Request for performing Google Cloud Vision API tasks over a user-provided image, with user-requested features, and with context information.

Methods

#image

def image => ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::Image

#image=

def image=(value) => ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::Image

#features=

def features=(value) => ::Array<::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::Feature>

#image_context

def image_context => ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ImageContext

#image_context=
